title: Achieve E-sports Recruiting! (Diamond 3+)

embed.description: Our goal is to make it into the Oceanic Challenger Series. We require a dedicated team willing to improve. Because of this, we wish to find top talent in the OCE community and nurture that talent into a world class team.If that is you fill in the form. Strive. Achieve.

body:
Hello! 

We are Achieve E-sports! ...Well not yet we need you for that! We are currently trailing players to form a competitive team with the goal of reaching the OCS and eventually the OPL.

If you are interested in playing in a team environment and fit the requirements listed below, fill in the attached form or leave a reply below!

Add   "DÃ¶c" or " One Self"  in-game for any inquiries.

Requirements:

* Working Microphone + Discord

* Willingness to improve

* Ability to handle Criticism

* Be able to dedicate at least 3 nights per week to practice

* Diamond 3 or above 

We look forward to your applications, 
Achieve E-sports Staff


Strive. Achieve. Succeed.

EDIT: 

Applications open until 11/2/2017

EDIT: #2

Applications have closed 11/2/2017 8:00 PM AEDT
